reviews.comments: Hermoso depto y Marcos muy atento!
Muy agradable dpto y muy buena ubicación.
El departamento es super cómodo. Seguridad las 24 hs. Amplio, luminoso,  un balcón muy lindo. Se respira ese aroma a BA. tan particular.   Idéntico a las fotos.
El departamento está en muy buenas condiciones, buena zona en Palermo y con seguridad. Todo perfecto para un viaje de negocios o trabajo.
Excelente estadía en el departamento de Marcos. Muy lindo el espacio y la zona. Altamente recomendable.
Todo impecable. El dpto hermosk

El departamento es super lindo. Excelente ubicación y vista.
100% recomendado!! Gracias Marcos por tu amabilidad y ayuda!
Excelente departamento gracias.
El departamento tan lindo como en las fotos. Impecable. Moderno y cálido. Todo limpio. El barrio inmejorable. Seguridad las 24hs. La vista es hermosa! Me volvería a alojar sin dudarlo.

El departamento es muy lindo y súper bien equipado , 
Marcos muy atento en todo , súper recomendable

Excelente anfitrión. Si bien no lo conocí dejó un botella de un muy buen vino como bienvenida. El departamento es tal cual lo describe.
Cómodo y muy bien ubicado. Perfecto para pasar unos días de placer/ descanso en Buenos Aires.

Increíble! Nos quedamos sin palabras. El departamento hermoso, muy bien ubicado y con una vista espléndida. La pasamos genial. Todo ordenado, limpio, funcionando. No se le escapó ni un detalle. Y encima, nos recibió con un vino de regalo. Gracias Marcos!

La atención de Marcos fue excelente . El departamento muy bueno tal como se ve el las fotos . Los porteros del edificio muy atentos y cuidando muy bien la seguridad . La zona es muy buena con gran cantidad de buenos restaurantes

reviewer.first_name: Hugo M. Pesa Y Cia S.R.L.
reviewer.host_name: Hugo M. Pesa Y Cia S.R.L.

reviews.comments: Excelente todo, el departamento esta impecable y en una ubicación genial! Marcos estuvo siempre pendiente de todo! Muy recomendable!

Llegamos y los encargados del edificio nos recibieron muy bien! El departamento hermoso y súper limpio! Gran vista y excelente ubicación! Marcos siempre atento a que llegáramos bien y no necesitáramos nada! Estuvimos mas que contentos con al eleccion y volveríamos cada vez que pudiéramos al departamento de marcos! Gracias por hacernos sentir en casa!

100% recomendable el departamento. Esta impecable, moderno, cómodo y en excelente  estado. En una zona ideal y muy linda.
Marcos es un excelente anfitrion, siempre estuvo atento a todo lo que necesitamos e inclusive nos dio muy buenas recomendaciones y sugerencias para conocer lugares gastronómicos e indicaciones de como manejarnos por la ciudad, siempre con muy buena  disposición.
Así que recomiendo 100% este departamento.

El departamento es muy cómodo, está muy bien decorado, tiene una hermosa vista desde el piso 10 de un moderno edificio, y contiene todo lo necesario para pasar unos lindos días de vacaciones en Buenos Aires. El barrio de Palermo Hollywood donde se encuentra es muy bonito, tranquilo, y repleto de bares y restaurantes muy top para todos los gustos y bolsillos.
Hermoso departamento! hemos pasado unos dîas maravillosos con la vista de buenos aires! El barrio excelente. Marcos un muy buen anfitriôn! Gracias!!!!

Anfitrión:  La verdad que da placer poder viajar y alquilar teniendo anfitriones que estén tan bien predispuestos. cada consulta o cada vez que necesité algo me contestaron y lo solucionaron instantáneamente.  Los felicito y les agradezco.

Departamento: hermoso. moderno. fuimos por un fin de semana y nos dieron ganas de quedarnos mas tiempo. y en mucho de eso tiene que ver el departamento. Recomendable 100%

Ubicación: es PERFECTA. todo lo que pueda decir es redundante. Cuando estén ahí van a poder confirmarlo.

una tranquilidad viajar a un lugar en el que uno no conoce (o conoce poco) y sentirse respaldado ante cualquier duda o necesidad. Gracias
Sitio fantástico en unos de los mejores barrio de Buenos Aires para alojarse. Todo cerca, restaurantes tiendas, ocio. Lugar ideal para disfrutar de la ciudad !!

Great apartment, great location, great decoration, great host!
Thanks!    /    Hermoso departamento, hermosa decoracion, muy buena
ubicacion, muy buen anfitrion.  Gracias!!!

Muy buen anfitrión, atento y siempre disponible durante toda la estadía. El departamento es excelente, todo impecable hasta en los mínimos detalles. La ubicación muy buena.  Lo mejor es la privacidad que te da y que no se encuentra en un hotel, uno se olvida que esta ahí de paso. La gente de seguridad del edificio muy amable y una vez que uno se anuncia al llegar, luego te manejas como un inquilino mas . Gracias Marcos por tu impecable atención y en especial por tu flexibilidad en el trato.

El departamento de Marcos es ideal para una estadía cómoda y céntrica en una de las mejores zonas de Buenos Aires. Tiene un balcón con una vista espectacular y todas las comodidades necesarias. La comunicación con Marcos estuvo muy bien, 100% de respuestas muy rápidamente. Lo recomendados vivamente y muy probablemente volveremos!
Apto muy bonito, cómodo excelente ubicación

A 2 cuadras está el Rest Las Cabras, muy rico y muuuy barato, las empanadas de lomo, las espinacas a la crema súper bastas y el bife de chorizo de lo mejor de los que visité aún más caros.
Tiene enfrente un pequeño súper y muy cerca un Outlet Distrito Sur muy bueno y bonito 
En resumen súper ubicado, con vigilancia 24 horas y muy amplio 
Lo recomiendo a ciegas
Jesus

El piso está genial, aunque con ciertos detalles que se podrían mejorar para futuros huéspedes! (La tapa del WC, más utensilios de cocina o mejor velocidad de internet). Pero nada resaltable! Hemos pasado unos días geniales, y las vistas son espectaculares. 

Embajador perfecto y atento siempre para darnos el mejor servicio.

¡Muchísimas gracias, Marcos!

El alojamiento es exactamente como Marcos anuncia. Una opción perfecta para visitar Buenos Aires, disfrutando de una localización muy atractiva, unas vistas espectaculares y una acogedora bienvenida por parte del anfitrión (aunque no sea personalmente). ¡Muy recomendable!
Buen lugar recomendable, es como aparece en la oferta, algo ruidoso solamente

Excelente apartamento en un muy lindo edificio. Cómodo, bien diseñado y con una vista excepcional...El balcón es ideal para cenas al aire libre durante el verano.
Disfrutable!
Muy bien ubicado, propietario disponible
Apartamento amplio, moderno, comodo y funcional. Excelente ubicación y Marcos nos brindó toda la información acerca Palermo y lugares buenos para comer. Lo recomiendo 100%

Muy buen apartamento muy espacioso, agradable y muy bien ubicado cerca de muchos bares y restaurantes en Palermo. 
Totalmente recomendado!
El departamento exactamente cómo sale en las fotos,con una ubicación perfecta.Lo recomiendo 100%.Gracias Marcos,muy amable.

Lindo lugar, bien para  una persona o una pareja.  El barrio muy lindo, con muchas opciones de comer y salir a los bares.  Mucha vide de noche en este barrio.  Me encanto la terraza.  Vista muy linda de la area - me quedaba alli tomando vino, leyendo...

Ubicación excelente a pocas cuadras de Palermo Soho. Apartamento bonito, buena decoración, cómodo y agradable.
Excelente comunicación con Marcos.
Unica pega, el check out es a las 10am.

La mejor ubicación, seguro y cerca de todo. El departamento muy bonito, cómodo y ordenado, exacto a las fotos.  Marcos es un excelente anfitrión, pendiente de todo y  me ayudó muchísimo. Altamente recomendado.
todo perfecto, el depto, la zona, los anfitriones.

El departamento de Marcos tiene una vista espectacular, muy buena ubicación, y todo muy bonito. Marcos se encarga de darte una lista de restaurantes a visitar y te responde enseguida a cualquier duda! Totalmente recomendado.

Mi Buenos aires querido - ciudad encantadora
Palermo Hollywood - barrio super simpático e charmoso
El departamento - lindo e  acojedor 
Marcos -  atencioso e cuidadoso

Nos sentimos felices
Gracias Marcos 
Queremos volver!

Excelente alojamiento! 100% recomendable. El barrio cuenta con un montón de ofertas gastronómicas todas muy buenas y para todos los gustos. Marcos siempre fue muy atento e inclusive nos compartió un mapa con recomendaciones que nos fue muy útil. Palermo es sin duda unos de los barrios mas pintorescos de buenos aires.
Excellent apartment at a great price. I always stay here every time I come to Buenos Aires. I love the area and the building
Excellent location, super clean and comfortable. The rooftop pool is amazing!
Beautiful apartment located in the best part of Palermo steps away from tons of shops and restaurants. The apartment was very clean, spacious and WIFI worked very well.  I recommend it
EXCELLENT apartment. I have stayed in this building already twice and I loved Marcos apartment.  Highly recommended
It is always great to stay in Marcos apartment. I already consider it my home in Buenos Aires every time I come.
Amazing apartment with an amazing view. Everything was great
Excellent apartment!  Every time I come to Buenos Aires I stay in Marcos apartment.  I love the location

I often come to Buenos Aires for work and this is the second time I rent this apartment. It is by far the best I have come across. It has everything one needs to feel comfortable, relax and work if needed. It has, as you see in the picture, a REAL table where one can work and eat. The apartment is impeccable, the kitchen is fully equipped, the bathroom has a great shower, the bedroom is a separate room. It has plenty of plugs everywhere (important if you need to work). It is well lit, has a beautiful view, the neighborhood is full of places to eat, and, last but NOT LEAST, the host is always attentive, he is permanently asking if you need anything, if everything is fine.
The host contacted me several times before my trip, providing useful information on the apartment and the neighborhood.

Excellent apartment, I loved it! This is the second time I rent an apartment from Marcos.  Las time I stayed in another apartment he has in this same building and I loved both.  This apartment is on a 10th floor with a great view of the city.  The decoration is beautiful and the location is perfect, near the best restaurants and bars.  The kitchen had lots of pots, pans and utensils, bed sheets were very good quality and new, WIFI worked very well and Marcos even left me a gift.   Thank you again for being such a great host

Awesome apartment, awesome building, awesome neighborhood, awesome host!  What else can I say?  We loved staying here.  So many good food, shopping and drinking places in this neighborhood.  Marcos's map with food/drink suggestions was really helpful.  The luggage storage room in the lobby near the front desk was an unexpected bonus, as we had a noon check-out and an evening flight.  Can't wait to check out the roof top pool when we are back in January.  Go ahead and reserve, you found the best place already!

Beautiful apartment!! Exactly as in the photos.  The place is located
 in the best part.   of Palermo.  Our host was very friendly and we had
 a great stay.   Hermoso departamento, igual que en las fotos.  Esta
 ubicado en la mejor zona de palermo.  Nuestro host fue muy atento y
 pasamos unos dias increibles. Lo recomiendo.

The stay at Marcos apartment was phenomenal. The apartment is wonderful and the location is amazing. Marcos also gave us plenty of great restaurant recommendations and the communication / check in was best in class. Absolutely recommendable.

Die Wohnung zeichnet sich vor allem durch die außerordentlich tolle Aussicht  aus und die vielen Fensterfronten. Den Sonnenuntergang vom Balkon oder Wohnzimmer aus zu betrachten ist einfach herrlich! Barrio Palermo Hollywood ist bekannt für die zahlreichen, gemütlichen Restaurants sowie Bars und ist gleichzeitig eine etwas sichere Nachbarschaft in dieser Grossstadt. Auf jeden Fall lohnt sich ein Besuch dieses Barrios.
Marcos, der Gastgeber, ist berechtigterweise ein „Super-Host“, weil er sehr hilfsbereit sowie bemüht ist und immer effizient auf Nachrichten antwortet.

Marcos’ place is in a great location; close by to many bars and restaurants without being loud. I also loved the pool- we had some hot days and it was great to cool off. As two women, the security guard in the lobby provided great piece of mind. Marcos was incredibly welcoming and communicative. We really enjoyed the patio for morning coffee and evening drinks. It was also a great view of all the firework displays on Christmas and NYE. We felt right at home after our first day.
The communication with Mr. Marcos is very good and the information he provides about Buenos Aires is very useful.

This apartment is spacious and modern and located in a great part of Buenos Aires. We arrived late but the 24 hour doorman let us in no problem. The apartment was clean and inviting, and a welcome stop for 3 nights. There is a laundry facility as well. It is a short walk to Palermo subway station and easy to find your way around on the trains. There are plenty of great places to eat within a short walk.
We had a great stay at Marcos' place. It is a nice apartment in a good location. The checkin was easy and the pool was fantastic!
A good place centrally located in Palermo Hollywood. Ideal for a few days on a city trip.

Our little family is visiting South America for the first time and Marcos’ home was ideally located and super comfortable. His recommendations for food and drink are very helpful. You will be right in the middle of the action in his home and still blissfully protected with no street noise, great views, a gorgeous pool and courteous and helpful security staff. For those traveling with little ones, the modular doors allow different parts of the space to be made more quiet and dark than others so baby can sleep while parents can still enjoy conversation!
Excellent location, bright and sunny.  Marco gave us some great information on restaurants and other local area things to do.
Great spot in Palermo. Amazing views and Marcos was a great host.

Marcos' place was perfect for our stay in Buenos Aires. The apartment is beautiful and the location is very central, in a fun neighborhood. The sunsets from every room were spectacular. I highly recommend it and would definitely come back!

Great location, loved the area. So many restaurants and bars, very trendy. The apartment was really comfortable, everything we needed and more. The balcony has lovely views over the city from where we watched some picture perfect sun sets. The rooftop pool was also great especially after a day of walking round the city in the heat, perfect for cooling off and topping up the tan! Marcos was a perfect host and always on hand if we had a question.
Beautiful place with a great panoramic view of the city.  Location is well placed for all the best eating places in Palermo.  Marcos is a super responsive host too.
Excellent location in a great, hip neighborhood.  The apartment is nice and was great for our stay in Buenos Aires:
Great place! Very clean and great location. Sunsets on the rooftop are the best in Palermo!

This was a great place in a fantastic location! Marco was very reachable on email and (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN). He gave us great tips on where to eat and things to do. The place had everything we needed and a great view! The bed was super comfy which is always a plus. Thank you Marcos! I would recommend everyone to stay here!

Marcos's place is in a great location and is just a few minutes walk from great shopping and some excellent restaurants.
The condo was bright and clean.  Highly recommended.

O apartamento do Marcos é exatamente como nas fotos. A localização é excelente. Além do anfitrião ser super atencioso e prestativo. Não tivemos nenhum problema com a hospedagem! A vista é realmente fantástica.
Marcos e seu apartamento são muito mais do que as mensagens positivas deixadas pelos hóspedes, foi tudo perfeito!!! Com certeza será meu endereço fixo em Buenos Aires.

Recomendo ficar neste apartamento. O bairro é seguro, animado, com vários restaurantes e bares. Fica há 5 quadras do metrô e achei relativamente perto de tudo. Os porteiros são simpáticos e sempre disponíveis para ajudar. O apartamento para duas pessoas é perfeito.
Great studio in a great neighborhood.
reviews.response: Hi Carlos! My place is NOT A STUDIO :)  Its a one-bedroom apartment and it has a total of 60 m2.

reviews.comments: Local maravilhoso. Tudo impecável. Bairro ótimo para família, casais e solteiros. Muito recomendo

We stayed in Marcos apartment for 3 nights and we liked it very much. 

The apartment is really modern and beautiful and looks exactly like on the pictures. The view from the apartment with its many and big windows is stunning ! 

There are a lot of restaurant and bar options in the neighbourhood. It's very safe, also at night. 

Everything worked easy and the communication with Marcos was perfect. He was a very caring host. We would always stay in his apartment again.
The apartment is great. Perfect location to explore. Wonderful bars and restaurants nearby. Great views and excellent building overall.
Bel appartement dans un quartier très sympa.

This apartment was great. Walking distance to subway and tons to do in the neighborhood. Lots of people around and felt very safe. Marcos was great and showed us a bit of the neighborhood when we came. Would recommend to anyone I know.

Tudo perfeito!
Com certeza voltaremos!
As fotos descrevem exatamente como é o apartamento.
The apartment is in a great location!
O apartamento de Marcos é muito confortável e agradável. Foi uma ótima experiência e recomendo pra quem pretende curtir a cidade em uma área cheia de opções de lazer e diversão.

This is a beautiful apartment in a wonderful neighborhood, and Marcos is a great host--communicative, friendly, tons of great advice about places to eat and drink! The kitchen is basic but functional: you won't be cooking a fine meal, but it's great for breakfast or a pot of pasta.

The apartment is exactly as pictured, down to the furnishings. You get an amazing view from floor 10 and lots of natural light and fresh air. From the apartment it's a short walk to any number of bars, restaurants and cafes -- though watch out for the uneven footpaths and dog-created landmines all over the neighbourhood.

Ons verblijf in Marco's appartement was geweldig! Wat een fijne plek, met een fantastisch uitzicht over de stad. Alles was goed verzorgd en de locatie is perfect. Er zijn heel veel restaurants en bars in de buurt en het openbaar vervoer is op loopafstand. Echt een aanrader!
Great stay overall. Location, apartment and communication are top notch.

I couldn't be happier with my stay at Marcos apartment. The location is absolutely amazing and the apartment is beautiful and comfortable. The view is breathtaking. The neighborhood is a bit noisy, but it didn't interfere in our stay. The best part of all was Marcos suggestions of restaurants. We have been to 4 of them and one was better than the other!! I wish i could have time to try all of his suggestions. The staff that worked for the building is super nice. This was the perfect airbnb choice for my holidays!!!

Palermo를 즐기기에 정말 적합한 위치였습니다. 치안, 의사소통, 청결함, 체크인도 더 편리했고 좋았습니다. 가장 좋은 점은 경치였습니다. 10층에
위치하기에 최고의 경치를 즐겼네요. 매우 강력하게 추천하고 싶어요!

This is a very nice, well-located apartment. It is close to a number of great restaurants and bars, in a safe, central area. Marcos was very communicative and answered all my (many) questions promptly. I highly recommend this apartment as a base for exploring Buenos Aires.
Loved the location. Every night took a bottle of wine to the rooftop to see the sunset of Buenos Aires. Breathtaking. We spent our mornings in the apartment with music and windows open!!
We had a wonderful stay. Terrific host, beautiful apartment, all the amenities we needed, terrific neighborhood!

Uma das melhores localizações de Palermo Hollywood. Perto de transporte público, ótimos restaurantes e cheio de conveniências ao redor. 
Ótimo apartamento, muito luminoso, cômodo e bem decorado. Cozinha bem equipada. Edifício muito funcional e seguro. Pessoal de portaria atencioso. Recomendo e sim voltarei.

Everything just as described.  Very convenient, very comfortable.  Great restaurants nearby, a lively and interesting neighborhood. Marcos was super prompt in replying to any questions or concerns and had many helpful suggestions, including a detailed online map of neighborhood features and amenities.

Marcos is place is wonderful and comforting....the area is great you really dont have to leave the neighborhood to get a good everlasting memories of BA....will difinetly recommend marcos place.. gracias marcos.
Everything about Marcos was super efficient.  Every aspect of the apartment was perfect.  The information provided was perfect and made our stay so comfortable. Thank you!

Great house in a really nice neighbourhood in Palermo - we really enjoyed our stay in Marcos's apartment and would highly recommend. It is clean, well looked after and has an amazing view of the city, all in a very safe building with an amazing rooftop pool. Thank you Marcos!

Marcos was a great host - very communicative leading up to our stay, providing recommendations and making sure that everything went smoothly. There is no real "check-in" process, as the apartment has a key code on it. You check-in with the building security guard (first time only) and head up to the apartment. The apartment is great - beautiful corner apartment with lots of windows and great views. It has everything you need - a small kitchen, living room with cable tv, a/c, bathroom, dining table, and a nice balcony with chairs. It is in a great location within Palermo, quiet street but still within blocks of all of the best restaurants. If I return to Buenos Aires, I would definitely stay here again. Thanks Marcos!

The apartment is really great. It is just as described and as it is to see on the photos.
The neighborhood is very lively , lots of restaurant and bars , it is safe to walk around and the location is ideal to explore the city. Public transport is quite near in walking distance , also a little carrefour express for food and drinks is literally across the street.
The balcony is nice to sit and watch over the roofs of Palermo and to enjoy an airy breeze.
There are two aircons in the flat , so also in summer the apartment is cool and you can sleep well.
If you are sensitive to noise keep in mind that you are in the middle of a bustling and lively neighbourhood , so maybe some earplugs maybe a good idea. 
Marcos has been a great host , always quick with answering and he gave us a huge amount of recommendations where to eat and drink in the neighborhood (and that is really a lot)!!! He also helped us with taxi to EZE Airport and with luggage storage.
Great place , great host - we definitely recommend that flat !!!

The apartment is exactly what anybody should look for in Buenos Aires. Located in a great neighborhood, with a great view and fully equipped. It was clean when we arrived and the host (Marcos) is always available and gave us very good recommendations of places to eat and drink. Stongly recommended!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay is Marcos's flat. It has amazing views and a perfect location. The block of flats felt safe and well looked after. There was lots to explore on the doorstep, as well as great transport links to other parts of the city. 
We would definitely stay here again- thank you for your attentive hospitality!

We had an excellent time and could not enjoy our time in BA more! The department is great, very well located and has all you need for a two-weeks stay. Really good experience and much recommended! Lots of shops, restaurant and public transport around only makes it easier to enjoy!
